name: obsidian-architect-vault-template
description: Obsidian vault template for Solutions Architects with automation scripts for validation, health checks, and knowledge graph generation

scripts.validate: npm run validate:frontmatter && npm run validate:links
scripts.stats: node scripts/health-check.js --format markdown > VAULT_STATS.md && echo 'Statistics exported to VAULT_STATS.md'
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run health
scripts.audit: npm run validate:all && npm run health && npm run graph

author: Solutions Architecture Team
